exchange.nft-prize: The prize includes all the following NFTs
exchange.blind-prize: The prize randomly includes {{count}} NFT(s) below
exchange.othder-prize: The organizer will give out the prize after you submit the redeem

alert.normal: The NFT(s) participating in the activity will be still owned by redeemer but marked as redeemed on chain. Redeemed NFT cannot be involved in other redeem activities anymore.
alert.destroy: The NFT(s) participating in the activity will be destroyed and cannot be retrieved once destroyed.

event.title: Activity Details
event.condition: Only users who own the following NFTs can participate in the activity

exchange.warning: The NFT(s) participating in the activity will be still owned by redeemer but marked as redeemed on chain. Redeemed NFT cannot be involved in other redeem activities anymore.
exchange.warning-destroyed: The NFT(s) participating in the activity will be destroyed and cannot be retrieved once destroyed.
